ygData.subject: RE: Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: Range of Screech is pretty small.  It looks like you have to be within melee range for it to work.  I often times will Fear + Chain Broon when I m cruising
ygData.messageBody:
Range of Screech is pretty small. It looks like you have to be within melee
range for it to work. I often times will Fear + Chain Broon when I'm
cruising through EK. There have been a handful of times when I Fear him
that it does nothing... no message... no resists... nada. If I move just a
couple steps closer, and re-apply Fear, it works as normal. It's
disconcerting the first couple of times that it doesn't work, because you
still get the "graphic", and you're sitting there waiting for your opponent
to run away.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

-----Original Message-----
From: kbachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 9:17 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Screech


From: kbachman <kbachman@...>

Just what is the range of a Screech? I just got it and was testing it on
goblins in Misty and Beholder, and it seems to me that it only works on
stuff very close to immediate melee range. It seemed to be a very
small area. Is this true? Or does it take awhile to kick in? Or does
range increase with level? I did enjoy watching four goblins drop
everything and flee in terror. Hehe.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 27 songs, Innoruuk
